channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: I’m moving cross country and want to fly my dog on a private jet. Is this a waste of money?
item.description: Driving is the most affordable and gives you more control of the situation. But flying is in your price range and cute.

item.title: ‘People are often unreasonable when money is involved’: My husband, 62, gave me a 5-year life estate. Would I have to pay for a new roof?
item.description: “He has included a provision stating that I would be responsible for ‘maintenance and expenses’ during my occupancy.”

item.title: My sister is buying our parents’ $3 million house, but wants to deduct $100K for renovations. Who’s right?
item.description: “If she didn’t want the home, it would have been sold at fair market value.”

item.title: I manage an $80K trust for a 15-year-old. How do I do deal with interfering relatives?
item.description: “I don’t want to step on any toes.”

item.title: Japan’s long-bond yields surge to record highs. Why it may be a problem beyond Tokyo.
item.description: The problems in Japan may expand elsewhere.

item.title: Ray Dalio warns that 'capital wars' could follow Trump's actions, with countries dumping U.S. assets
item.description: Dalio said history offers multiple examples of similar episodes in which economic conflict escalated beyond trade into capital flows and currency disp...

item.title: Software stocks face 'Innovator's Dilemma' as they plunge on AI fears
item.description: Intuit, ServiceNow, AppLovin and Adobe are among the S&P 500's worst performers in 2026, as the software sector is off to its worst start in years.

item.title: Generating income: This natural gas stock has paid a dividend for more than a century
item.description: In addition to buying the stock, an investor interested in potentially enhancing income beyond dividends could consider a buy-write options strategy.

item.title: Evercore ISI turns bullish on Toast, cites improved risk-reward after sell-off
item.description: Evercore ISI's $40 price target implies upside of 19% from where shares of Toast currently trade.

item.title: Chevron gets JPMorgan upgrade, citing Hess integration and cost reductions
item.description: Key catalysts for Chevron are its Yellowtail project in Guyana and Tengizchevroil project in Kazakhstan, the bank said.
